name: W3 Business Advisors
overview:
W3 Business Advisors is a Chicago based business brokerage that deals exclusively with internet based companies.

Understanding the internet business market is the key to effective valuations, marketing and ultimately the negotiations for any internet-based company. Our team is comprised of internet entrepreneurs with strong finance and accounting backgrounds that have successfully launched, operated and sold a variety of online businesses; we thoroughly understand that a large portion of an online companyâ€™s value is in less tangible assets such as organic traffic rankings, business models, website infrastructure, financial history, proprietary software code and intellectual property. We are experts in understanding all aspects of online businesses and focus on the most attractive selling points to bring in competitive offers that your internet based company deserves.

Selling your online business can be a confusing and complex process that most business owners have little to no experience with. Unlike traditional business brokers, who on average represent 1-2 internet-based companies a year, our brokers deal exclusively with internet-based companies and look at all aspects of the company including valuing less tangible assets that generally account for the majority of an online companyâ€™s value. Our brokers have the industry specific insight needed to successfully market your internet business, negotiate with qualified buyers and bring value to the process unsurpassed by the competition.

When determining the best strategy for making a large acquisition investment, it is crucial that you choose to work with brokers who have experience with internet-based companies and can guide you every step of the way. W3 Business Advisors is a full service brokerage that offers services that are tailored to meet the unique requirements of each of our clients.
